                  :degree (s / so)))

      :ARG2 (c5 / censor-01
            :polarity -)
      :snt5 (a / and

                  :ARG0 (y2 / you
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Sir"))
                  :ARG1 (t2 / thot

                  :mod (y3 / yes))
            :op2 (p / possible-01

                  :ARG1 (h / have-03

                  :ARG1 (s2 / some
                        :quant (m2 / more))))
      :snt6 (g / get-back-10

            :ARG1 (y4 / you)
            :ARG2 (p2 / phone
                  :poss y4))
      :snt7 (z / zzzzzzz))
